Hanna Hindriksdotter

Hanna Hindriksdotter was born on March 18, 1798 to Anna Tufvetsdotter (06/15/1757) and Henric Pehrsson (03/10/1759) in Resåkra, Hyby parish, Malmöhus county (1A). The family lived in Resåkrahus until 1814 (1B, 1C, 1D) when they moved to Eksholm No. 3 (1E), most likely a farm in Hyby parish. In 1816, Hanna moved to Eksholm No. 4 (1F) and later that year her father, Henric Pehrsson, died on the 22nd of December, 1816 (1E). By 1818, Hana had moved again to Eksholm No. 1 and 2 (1G) and then to Winnige No. 4 in Hyby parish in 1819 (1H). In 1820, she lived in Tejarp No. 1 (1I) before she married Nils Jonsson sometime in 1821 and moved to his family’s farm in Tejarp No. 5. They had their first son, Pehr that same year (1J). Two years later, Ola Nilsson was born on the 4th of November, 1823 (1K). Nils and Hanna lived together on the farm for the rest of their lives (1L, 1M, 1N, 1O, 1P).

On the 16th of April, 1850, Nils Jonsson passed away at the age of 56 (1N). Jons Andersson then became the head of household starting in 1851 (1O). He lived with Hanna in Tejarp No. 5 until her death on the 27th of April, 1860 (1P).

Her mother, Anna, stayed in Eksholm No. 4, listed as living independently of any household for over 25 years (1Q, 1R, 1S, 1T). She died on November 12, 1845 at the age of 88 (1T).

References

Born: March 18, 1798 (1A)

Birthplace: Hyby, Malmöhus (Skåne), Sverige (Sweden) (1A)

Mother: Anna Tufvetsdotter (1A, 1B)

Father: Henric Pehrsson (1A, 1B)

Husband: Nils Jonsson (1J)

Married: ~1821 (1J)

Marriage Place: Tejarp, Hyby, Malmöhus (Skåne), Sverige (Sweden) (1J)

Direct Descendant: Ola Nilsson (1K)

Death: April 27, 1860 (1P)

Death Place: Tejarp No. 5, Hyby, Malmöhus (Skåne), Sverige (Sweden) (1P)

Burial Place: unknown (?)
